reviewText:
A love story in true Chinese style. There is also great Martial Arts for those who like action.
I think anyone would enjoy this movie the characters are devoted and it's intruinging to
the end also has a a little comedic aspect.

This movie a re-make of the classic story.  Really good, but tearfully sad ending.

It's quite comical at first.  As the plot develops, more emotions are thrown into the mix.
